Character:
Chidori, later known as Umegae (腰元千鳥後に傾城梅ヶ枝(傾城梅ヶ枝) / 腰元千鳥後に傾城梅ヶ枝(傾城梅ヶ枝))

Plays:

The Battles of Genji and Heike (Hiragana seisuiki / ひらかな盛衰記)

Authority Control:
November 1988 Program; Bunka dejitaru raiburarii
